ModMetadata.Name: Stationpedia Ascended
ModMetadata.Author: FlorpyDorp
ModMetadata.Description:
This is a Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
An enhanced Stationpedia experience with comprehensive tooltips, bug fixes, and quality of life improvements. Stationpedia on a new level. Save time searching through the outdated wiki with descriptions right from the game's source code.
Features: - Enhanced Tooltips: Hover over logic types, slots, memory, modes, and connections to see detailed explanations - Operational Details: A dedicated section showing advanced device information and tips - Page Customization: Replace, append, or prepend descriptions to any Stationpedia page via JSON - Bug Fixes: Fixed scrollbar handle disappearing and window dragging crashes - Custom Branding: Phoenix logo and orange accent colors
All tooltips and descriptions are customizable via descriptions.json.
Discord: https://discord.gg/stationeers
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: v0.2.1: Enhanced search with smart grouping, visual headers, debris filtering v0.2.0: Public release preparation, conditional compilation v0.1.3: Fixed PDB symbol format for hot-reload, added code organization v0.1.2: Major code refactoring into multi-file architecture v0.1.0: Initial beta with tooltips, operational details, bug fixes
